antiPatterns.name: Deep Hierarchy
antiPatterns.description: This smell arises when an inheritance hierarchy is excessively deep.
antiPatterns.context: In other words, a hierarchy that is deep makes the design more complex which leads to poor understandability and a greater possibility of design or implementation errors. Hence, it is important to avoid hierarchies that are excessively deep. A popular value for the depth is 6.
antiPatterns.cause: Focus on reuse and speculative generalization
